EXTRACTED VALUE: Based on fairly limited use, I like this camera. So far I have used it just to record videos, and that has been easy. The price was very reasonable.
Really like this camera! Compact, easy to carry anywhere, easy to use, doesn't have knobs on top that can accidentally be bumped. It's GREAT!
Very satisfied for the price I paid. Refurbished looks like new. No problems at all!
Great product, good price, product came as specified, would do business with this company again.
